attributeList.name: circuits_d4
attributeList.doc: Circuits defined as lists of operations with a circuit depth of four. Each list is a circuit that approximates the flexible representation of quantum images (FRQI).

attributeList.name: circuits_d8
attributeList.doc: Circuits defined as lists of operations with a circuit depth of eight. Each list is a circuit that approximates the flexible representation of quantum images (FRQI).

attributeList.name: target_states
attributeList.doc: A list of numpy arrays. Each numpy array defines a quantum state that exactly encodes an MNIST image.

attributeList.name: labels
attributeList.doc: A list of the correct labels for each image.
